Name: A Shaman's Ballard
About the game: A shaman's ballard tells the story of Melody, a shaman apprentice summoned by the ancient goddess to go on a pilgrim journey for her shanar, the rite of initiation to the order of Aahkray. It turns out Erenblad holds more secrets than anticipated and Melody must use her sound bending abilities not only to reach the goddess, but also to protect the land from imminent danger. Inspired by real shamanism. FEATURESâ€‹ Explore a colorful and mysterious world A pilgrim journey filled with danger Strong focus on tactical combat, storytelling and aesthetics Tactical turn-based RPG Cute main characters in anime style CHARACTERS Melody - shaman apprentice and sound bender Sacrista - wind archer Aju - shaman priest and shadow bender Squalus - water/lightning arch mage
